definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
to look after/to take into consideration/to attend to

sentences.english: Lounge patrons desperately wanted to imbibe the essence of all this.
sentences.chinese: 酒吧的老主顾们极欲将全部精华吸收殆尽。

sentences.english: Of course. Every hotel depends upon the repute of its patrons.
sentences.chinese: 当然啦，每家旅馆都要依靠其主顾的名声。

sentences.english: Original oat-fiber flavor is the most memorable nice flavor of loyal customers' taste bud.
sentences.chinese: 原味麦纤是老主顾味蕾中最怀念的好滋味。

sentences.english: This pub has many loyal customers.
sentences.chinese: 这间酒吧有许多忠实的老主顾。

sentences.english: Tom Wilkinson is his arrogant and lascivious patron.
sentences.chinese: 汤韦坚逊是华米亚傲慢及好色的主顾。

sentences.english: The exclusive store prided itself on its carriage trade .
sentences.chinese: 这家高级商店以主顾富有为荣。

sentences.english: Many regular customers have noticed that the service in this restaurant is in decline.
sentences.chinese: 许多老主顾都感觉到了这家饭店的服务质量每况愈下。

sentences.english: Keep rare items back for customers who would pay the best prices.
sentences.chinese: 把紧俏商品留给肯出大价钱的主顾们。

sentences.english: The restaurant's regular customers are being crowded out by tourists.
sentences.chinese: 这家餐馆的老主顾被游客挤得不得其门而入。

sentences.english: The firm has more clients than it can take care of.
sentences.chinese: 这家商行的主顾多得应接不暇。

sentences.english: How many regular buyers would you have?
Sharks must be good customers, paying with their bodily food rewards.
sentences.chinese: 鲨鱼一定是个好主顾，它们用身上的食物付钱。

sentences.english: The manager had a fierce face, and the customers also lacked pleasant voices.
sentences.chinese: 掌柜是一副凶脸孔，主顾也没有好声气。

sentences.english: Many a customer has been lost through negligence of service.
sentences.chinese: 由于服务不周失去了许多老主顾。

sentences.english: He says some of his overseas customers are now late in making payments.
sentences.chinese: 他表示，现在他的一些海外主顾付款并不及时。

sentences.english: Greg was a regular at the casino and everyone there knew him.
sentences.chinese: 格雷格是赌场的老主顾了，那里的每个人都认识他。
